DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study test feasibility innovative , couple base approach weight management pregnancy . The primary hypothesis couples-based behavioral weight management program reduce rate gestational weight gain compare standard care .
DOC.brief_title: Partners Health : A Couples-based Approach Obesity Prevention
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Women > 18 year old 1522 week gestation BMI > = 25 cohabitating partner least 3 month recently marry willing consent Nonpregnant Partner BMI > = 25 cohabitating partner least 3 month recently marry willing consent Untreated medical psychological problem Inability physically active
